item.title: Religion vs. spirituality - why I prefer the latter
item.description: What I have learned about religions and spirituality over the last years and decades boils down to one simple statement: Religion is about right and wrong and old, outdated dogmas, while spirituality simply says "It is how it is". For spirituality, there is no right or wrong, only the single moment in the present in which we dwell. I find this viewpoint quite amazing. From what I found, it leads to a more awakened state.
